TopicTitle: Why I changed my sig. (Again... this is my fourth time! (I think.))

Articles.Content:
If you look right below this post, you will see that my old sig using the challenge badges for the K-Prize and the Itty Bitty Airplanes Challenge badges has been replaced by a text based sig similar to the first one I had on the forums. There are two reasons for this, and I will explain them. First, I just thought it was friendlier than the badge sig. That was simple, but the second is... more complicated. The second reason is because of the new KSP aerodynamics of 1.0. I did the two challenges that I was talking about earlier in 0.90, which had a simpler model. The first reason grabbed at me forever, but the second reason only struck me tonight. So I hope you enjoy (or bear) my new sig.

Cheers, RAINCRAFTER.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-01T02:17:40Z" title="06/01/2015 02:17  AM" data-short="9 yr">June 1, 2015</time> by RAINCRAFTER**
Okay... I changed my sig because I accidentally screwed it up when changing it.
I changed my sig because I got really concerned about privacy when someone posted a google search with my name.

Wow, that's a lot of meaning into changing it. Especially with the coming of 1.0..

I recently changed mine because people told me that it would look better centered.

I'm not changing my sig any time soon, not least because I don't want to dig through this:
